column4: I think Electro would rather stick with windows for simple and quick installs of the latest and greatest without any hassle even if he has to deal with all the bugs viruses worms trojans and overall insecure windows
I'm on a max as we speak and... er... *cough*... I'm not so sure I like mac!
the first thing I did when I got this macbook (a week ago) was set it up to triple-boot osx, kubuntu and winders
